summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Kids In Tech LMS - Backend APIs 100% functional, Frontend login flows and dashboards working well with proper branding

ui_bugs.issue: Navigation links in sidebar have duplicate elements causing timeout issues - links are present but visibility/click detection fails

passed_tests: Database seeding with 14 users, 5 courses, 20 lessons, 18 enrollments
Admin dashboard KPI cards display (10 students, 3 instructors, 5 courses, 16 enrollments)
Forgot password page renders and functions
Kids In Tech branding and split-screen login layout
User management, courses, enrollments, analytics, quizzes, assignments, certificates APIs
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix sidebar navigation issue - duplicate elements with same data-testid causing visibility detection problems. Consider using unique selectors or checking element visibility state.
